segment.source: If changes are made to a controlled Group Policy Object (GPO) outside of Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), you can import a copy of the GPO from the production environment and save it to the archive to bring the archive and the production environment to a consistent state.
segment.target: If changes are made to a controlled Group Policy Object (GPO) outside of Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), you can import a copy of the GPO from the production environment and save it to the archive to bring the archive and the production environment to a consistent state.

segment.source: (To import an uncontrolled GPO, control the GPO.
segment.target: (To import an uncontrolled GPO, control the GPO.

segment.source: A user account with the Editor, Approver, or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in AGPM is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Editor, Approver, or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in AGPM is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To import a GPO from the production environment
segment.target: To import a GPO from the production environment

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.
segment.target: On the Contents tab, click the Controlled tab to display the controlled GPOs.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO, and then click Import from Production.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO, and then click Import from Production.

segment.source: Type a comment for the audit trail of the GPO, and then click OK.
segment.target: Type a comment for the audit trail of the GPO, and then click OK.

segment.source: By default, you must be an Editor, Approver, or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be an Editor, Approver, or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents and either Edit Settings, Deploy GPO, or Delete GPO permissions for the GPO.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents and either Edit Settings, Deploy GPO, or Delete GPO permissions for the GPO.

segment.source: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
segment.target: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
